name: LISTERINE® ANTISEPTIC MOUTHWASH COOL MINT® FOR BAD BREATH & PLAQUE

summary.value:
The LISTERINE® COOL MINT® mouthwash is not only antimicrobial and a germ killer, but also a people pleaser. An oral antiseptic, its bold tingle has been America's favorite for years. Just 30 seconds of rinsing, twice a day, is all it takes to reap the benefits of LISTERINE® COOL MINT® Antiseptic Mouthwash. You’ll get 24-hour protection with the following antiseptic mouthwash benefits:

Destroys 5x more plaque above the gumline than floss!*
Clinically proven health benefits
The power to kill germs that lead to bad breath, plaque and gum disease
21% greater gingivitis reduction than merely brushing and flossing alone
Greater reach than brushing and flossing alone—with 100% coverage on teeth, between teeth and along the gum line
Reduce 52% more plaque than brushing and flossing alone
Is the only nationally branded antimicrobial mouthwash to receive the ADA Seal of Acceptance for fighting plaque and gingivitis.
*Germ kill provides sustained plaque reduction after a dental cleaning. Rinse is not intended to replace brushing or flossing. Use product only as directed.

directions.value: Adults and children 12 years of age and older:
Rinse full strength for 30 seconds with 20 ml (2/3 fluid ounce or 4 teaspoonfuls) morning and night. Do not swallow.

warnings.value: in children under 12 years of age.
Keep out of reach of children
. If more than used for rinsing is accidentally swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

additional_info.value:
This rinse is not intended to replace brushing or flossing
Store at room temperature
Cold weather may cloud this product. Its antiseptic properties are not affected.

For comments, questions, feedback about our products or to report an adverse event or side effect from our products, please visit our Contact Us page.
